senses.sense_definition: A legal state or process in which a bankrupt company is managed by an appointed official to pay off its debts.

examples.text: The struggling airline was forced to go into <w>receivership</w> after failing to secure a new loan.
Creditors were relieved when the court placed the factory in <w>receivership</w> to manage its assets.

senses.sense_definition: The position, authority, or period of office of a receiver.

examples.text: During his <w>receivership</w>, he successfully reorganized the company's finances.
The lawyer accepted the <w>receivership</w> despite the complex nature of the case.
